value.name: Phoenix approves civilian review board for police misconduct claims
value.description: Phoenix City Council voted Wednesday to create the Office of Accountability and Transparency for civilian investigations of alleged police misconduct.

video.name: Phoenix approves civilian review board for police misconduct claims

value.name: Bodycam video shows fatal shooting of James Garcia
value.description: Phoenix Police have released bodycam video showing the fatal shooting incident of James Garcia on July 4. The video has been edited by police to blur faces and includes some narration. NBC News ...

value.name: ‘Left without answers’: James Garcia’s family demands full body camera release
value.description: The family of James Garcia, who was fatally shot by Phoenix police while parked in a driveway, is demanding the department release all unedited body camera footage of the incident, though police ...

value.name: Phoenix police chief calls on FBI to investigate officer-involved shooting caught on video
value.description: The July 4 shooting of James Garcia sparked protests and calls for transparency at a time when scrutiny of police departments has soared in recent months. "I am taking this step in the best ...

value.name: Fatal shooting of man in parked car by Phoenix police sparks growing outrage
